title: Large Language Models for Telecommunications: A Survey on Principles Key Techniques and Opportunities

sections.description: Introduce the topic of large language models (LLMs) in telecommunications, highlighting their growing importance and potential impact. Discuss the motivation for conducting this survey and outline the objectives of the paper.
